description:
Specifies an area and USS related information to create test resources that require them.

monitoring.uss_qualifier.resources.uss_area.USSAreaSpecification, as defined in monitoring/uss_qualifier/resources/uss_area.py

$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

altitude_max.description: Upper altitude bound of service area, meters above WGS84 ellipsoid

altitude_min.description: Lower altitude bound of service area, meters above WGS84 ellipsoid

base_url.description:
Base URL for the USS

Note that this is the API base URL, not the flights or any other specific URL.

This URL will probably not identify a real resource in tests.
